requirements.summary: Center-align the text inside the specific button label <span> identified by the provided XPath by styling only that <span>.
acceptanceCriteria: The text inside the selected `<span>` renders centered (not left-aligned) in its current UI context.
The change is applied only to the selected `<span>` element; no other layout/spacing changes occur elsewhere on the page.

file_operations.description: Locate the <span> that corresponds to XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[5]/button[1]/div[1]/span[1]` and apply styling ONLY to that <span> to center its text within available width (e.g., make it full-width and add center text alignment via utility classes or existing className composition), without altering any surrounding elements.
